TailorPro

home Home dashboard Dashboard person Profile
Welcome, {{ loggedInUser.name }} {{ loggedInUser.shopName }}
import { Component, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; import { MatSidenav } from '@angular/material/sidenav'; @Component({ selector: 'app-tailor-layout', templateUrl: './tailor-layout.component.html', styleUrls: ['./tailor-layout.component.css'], }) export class TailorLayoutComponent { @ViewChild('sidenav') sidenav!: MatSidenav; isProfileDropdownOpen = false; // Controls profile dropdown visibility // Mock logged-in user data loggedInUser = { name: 'John Doe', shopName: 'Fashion Tailors', }; toggleSidenav() { this.sidenav.toggle(); } closeSidenav() { this.sidenav.close(); } toggleProfileDropdown() { this.isProfileDropdownOpen = !this.isProfileDropdownOpen; } logout() { console.log('User logged out'); // Add logout logic here (e.g., clear session, navigate to login page) } }
